pullRequest.title: fix(TBD-9558): Upgrade to CXF 3.3.4
pullRequest.bodyText:
TBD-9558
Please check if the PR fulfills these requirements

 The commit(s) message(s) follows our guidelines ?
 Unit tests for the Java changes have been added (for bug fixes / features) ?
 TUJ for the JavaJet changes have been added (for bug fixes / features) ?
 Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features) ?
 The new code does not introduce new technical issues

What is the current behavior? (You can also link to an open issue here)
What is the new behavior?
BREAKING CHANGE
If this PR contains a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration
path for existing applications.
If not please remove this section.
Other information:

commit.message: fix(TBD-9558): Upgrade to CXF 3.3.4 in components
fix(TBD-9558): update cxf to 3.3.4 for databricks
fix(TBD-9558): update cxf to 3.3.4 for hdinsight and qubole
fix(TBD-9558): update cxf to 3.3.4 for hdinsight and tests
fix(TBD-9558): update cxf to 3.3.4 for components

nodes.bodyText: why the /6.0.0 if it's not a talend's nexus ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -145,28 +145,23 @@
 				MVN="mvn:wsdl4j/wsdl4j/1.6.3" BundleID="org.apache.servicemix.bundles.wsdl4j"
 				REQUIRED="false" REQUIRED_IF="DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'" />
 
-			<IMPORT NAME="cxf-rt-frontend-jaxrs-2.7.7" MODULE="cxf-rt-frontend-jaxrs-2.7.7.jar"
-				MVN="mvn:org.talend.libraries/cxf-rt-frontend-jaxrs-2.7.7/6.0.0"
-				UrlPath="platform:/plugin/org.talend.libraries.apache.cxf/lib/cxf-rt-frontend-jaxrs-2.7.7.jar"
+			<IMPORT NAME="cxf-rt-frontend-jaxrs-3.3.4" MODULE="cxf-rt-frontend-jaxrs-3.3.4.jar"
+				MVN="mvn:org.apache.cxf/cxf-rt-frontend-jaxrs/3.3.4"				
 				REQUIRED="false" REQUIRED_IF="DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'" />
 			<IMPORT NAME="javax.ws.rs-api-2.0-m10" MODULE="javax.ws.rs-api-2.0-m10.jar"
-				MVN="mvn:org.talend.libraries/javax.ws.rs-api-2.0-m10/6.0.0"
+				MVN="mvn:org.apache.cxf/javax.ws.rs-api-2.0-m10/6.0.0"

commit.message:
Fix/tbd 9558): correct cxf lib names (#1251)

* feat(TBD-9558): correct jar names
fix(TBD-9948): compile error for tHCatalog components (#1255)

fix(TBD-9954): NoClassDefFoundError in javax/ws/rs/ProcessingExceptionException (#1263)

* fix(TBD-9954): Exception in thread main java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError in javax/ws/rs/ProcessingExceptionException
fix(TBD-9970): NoClassDefFoundError: javax/ws/rs/MessageProcessingException in tDBFS components

nodes.bodyText: Is it intended that cxf-rt-core was removed ?
Do you know if upgrading to bigdata-launcher-2.1.0 and removing cxf from there will work ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -5,39 +5,28 @@
 
          <!-- hd insight common libraries -->
         <libraryNeeded
-            context="plugin:org.talend.libraries.apache.cxf"
-            id="cxf-api-2.7.7.jar"
-            name="cxf-api-2.7.7.jar"
-            mvn_uri="mvn:org.talend.libraries/cxf-api-2.7.7/6.0.0"
-            uripath="platform:/plugin/org.talend.libraries.apache.cxf/lib/cxf-api-2.7.7.jar">

commit.message: fix(TBD-9558): update big-data launcher for HDInsight

nodes.bodyText: Already on talend-bigdata-launcher-platform-2.0.1 so all cxf deps should be removed
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -253,8 +251,8 @@
              <library id="commons-lang-2.6.jar"/>
              <library id="commons-lang3-3.5.jar"/>
              <library id="commons-logging-1.2.jar"/>
-             <library id="cxf-rt-rs-client-3.2.4.jar"/>
-             <library id="cxf-bundle-jaxrs-2.7.18.jar"/>
+             <library id="cxf-rt-rs-client-3.3.4.jar"/>

nodes.bodyText: CXF can completely be removed from Qubole deps because Qubole provide its own Java SDK

commit.message: fix(TBD-9558): remove cxf dependenceis from Qubole
fix(TBD-9558): remove cxf from Databricks distribution
